testcase.classname: Vodafone customer should be able to do shopping with filtering and listing
testcase.name: Vodafone customer do shopping with filtering and listing
testcase.system-out: Given Opening app with Appium...............................................passed And Login to the Yanimda as a VF customer...................................passed Then Customer clicks Her Sey Yanimda application............................passed And Customer clicks Gunun Teklifleri page...................................passed And Customer clicks "Filtrele" section......................................passed And Customer clicks Fiyat Araligi...........................................passed And Customer lists the products from the Gunun Teklifleri between "150"-"200" TL.passed Then Customer clicks Sirala and chooses En Dusuk Fiyat......................passed And Customer adds the cheapest product to his-her favorites.................passed And Customer clicks Sirala and chooses En Yuksek Fiyat......................passed And Customer adds the most expensive product to his-her basket..............passed
